descriptionHtml:
The Story:

Balgruuf lost his balls after dating an crow witch. So he/she decides to call him/herself Balgrufa. Thats it- 

Description:
Changes Baalgruf to Balgrufa

Installation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Just Put the ESP and BSA Files in your Skyrim Data Folder and enable it with the Manager.

Deinstallation:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Erase the Balgruuf files from your Skyrim Data Folder.
author: LordDenethor
